verbose_text: Based on our observations that P2X7R knockout decreased AD related pathology in a mouse model and given that P2X7R activation induced microglial activation and cytokine release [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR], we next asked whether knocking out this receptor would also decrease the pro inflammatory effects previously reported in mouse models of AD [XREF_BIBR].
